name: Programmer Dungeon - Knight
description:
A tactical puzzle game that takes place in a dungeon!

Battle countless enemies in this dark dungeon where your movement is limited. For each phase, you will have to think of your own tactic. If you win, a more dangerous dungeon awaits you!

How to play!
  1. Drag or click on your UI skills to assemble a sequence of moves.
  2. Then hit play on your UI to execute this sequence!
  3. If you don't win, go back and build another sequence until you win.
With limited movement comes great responsibilities! To know more about us!
